Class JenaReaderRIOT

All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
JenaReaderNTriples2, JenaReaderTurtle2
public abstract class JenaReaderRIOT
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFReader

Abstract class that sorts out input streams, readers and base URIs, to call a single worker function with model, UTF8 reader and visited base
